roleset.name: create
roleset.note: MANUFACTURE-V NOTES: Source might not occur. Do not tag nominal usages: "Manufacturing causes pollution." (from manufacture.01-v)
MANUFACTURING-N NOTES: Source might not occur. Do not tag nominal usages: "Manufacturing causes pollution." (from manufacturing.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The company has been manufacturing carpet since 1967.

example.name: passive
example.text: That means goods-1 could be manufactured *trace*-1 closer to customers, saving shipping costs, he said.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: He said Tandy-1 ``has done a decent job'' *trace*-1 increasing sales by *trace*-1 manufacturing computers for others...

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: because [they]-1 're above a furniture store right now like PRO-1 doing manufacturing.

example.name: passive
example.text: Their manufacturing of artefacts from natural materials is part of the custom of the country.
